Here's some good news: The Nation magazine will publish the Vermont senator's Dec. 10 tirade against extending the George W. Bush-era tax cuts in its entirety this February. The book will be titled, The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. Bernie Sanders ' speech was not technically a filibuster because it did not hold up any legislative action. But the technicality did not bother Bernie Sanders ' fans.
